reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's fit, noting it's just the right length, and appreciate its quality, style, and color options. The fabric receives positive feedback for being soft and nice on the skin, with one customer highlighting its versatility for dressing up or down. While many find it true to size, some mention it runs a bit large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality knit, consistent in sizing & colors are spot on as advertised!
items.body: UPDATE: I love these sweaters to wear under jackets & cardigans so much I have order 2 more, yup that is a total of 5 of them. They go with so many things, are warm yet light enough to not feel bulky at all and even though the tag says "hand wash" I washed them on the delicate cycle and even put them in the dryer on delicates. I will admit that they shrunk about an inch in length after putting them in the dryer but I wanted them to shrink in length because at 5' none, everything is too long for me! Great shell sweaters and all of them were true to the colors shown and are very soft & comfortable! These sweaters (I ordered them in 3 colors) are of very high quality knit. They look very polished especially under a jacket or cardigan. I wore one under a jacket flying on a trip and they were perfect for keeping me warm on the planes. The colors are spot on, the sizing seems to be spot on though they are a little long on me, that isn't the fault of the sweater, I'm just very short waisted. I loved all 3 and they were all the exact same size laying them side by side. I hate it when you buy the same thing in different colors and even though you order the same size, the product is always consistent. Not the case with these, all 3 were perfect! Read more
items.author: KHalstead

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality and classy in every way!
items.body: Lately, many of the clothes on Amazon have exceeded my expectations. This top is one of those. The brown color is rich and saturated. It fits perfectly with no gaps around the armholes and a perfectly fitted neckline -- not too high or low or wide. The fabric is substantial and tightly knitted, but the fabric is soft and silky (no shine) and not see through. The construction is like much more expensive garments; there were no hanging threads anywhere and the stitching is perfect. This is the perfect top to wear under a jacket or sweater. It hits at high hip and falls loosely without being tight. I bought it in two beautiful colors -- the brown and lake green (a teal) and both are jewel-like. I'm going to buy it in white and black! This top is sophisticated, timeless and classic. Read more
items.author: Aleta

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love fabric and look / it’s a bit large in chest area
items.body: I love the fabric of this sweater vest . It is soft and the fabric looks expensive enough to dress up or down. I ordered a ‘M’ as the site suggested , however, I feel it’s too large in bust area and gaps under arms. (4*) It’s a little long hitting at hip area but I like that as I can wear with leggings.. or tuck in with suit. For reference, I’m 4’9”, 121 lbs and 36C. I will be reordering in a ‘S’ and in various colors. As for shrinkage, I’ve no idea as returning this one. When in receive the Small size I can determine at that time. Read more
items.author: River

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfect for Summer Layers! I bought the BTFBM Sleeveless Sweater Vest in Grey Blue (size Small) and couldn’t be happier. The color is a beautiful soft blue with a hint of grey—versatile enough to pair with jeans, trousers, or shorts. The ribbed knit texture gives it a more elevated look compared to your average tank, and the material is soft and lightweight without being sheer. The fit is true to size—relaxed but not oversized—and the crew neck sits just right, giving it a polished silhouette. It's great for layering under blazers or cardigans or wearing alone on warmer days. I’ve already worn it to both the office and weekend brunch, and it worked perfectly for both. Washes well with no shrinking or pilling so far. I may grab a second color! Let me know if you want a more critical or casual version! Read more
items.author: Shirley Callahan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shell under a blazer
items.body: This is a great lightweight sweater to wear under a blazer for work. It is comfortable and looks polished. Read more
items.author: James Purcell

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color and fit is good but low quality fabric
items.body: Not a very good quality top. The color is nice and the fit is nice, but after a few washes, there's visible signs of wear. Read more
items.author: lori may

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater for warm weather
items.body: Ordered size based on reviews. It is a soft knit, sweater, which I hoped. It falls nicely and does not drape overly. It is a bit shorter that expected, but looks nice tucked in or out. Lightweight enough to wear under a cardigan or blazer. Read more
items.author: Mjfranks223

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its stylish and has a nice fit
items.body: I love the style and the fit of this sweater. It looks very nice underneath a blazer. I’ve also found that it is a simple care item and it packs really well to go on trips. The size chart was appropriate and it fits very nicely without being tight. So far,I have not noticed that shrinking Read more
items.author: Vicki Weaver

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot Khaki, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Rose Red, Light Grey Blue, Lake Blue, Royal Blue, Grey, Light Brown, Maroon, Dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
